title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Competencies: Mobile Microlearning-Based Electronic Learning (E-Learning) Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device literacy and intermediate scientific expertise
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can design mobile-friendly eLearning content by applying the five stages of the ADDIE model.
Learners can create microlearning modules incorporating learner-instructor interaction elements using the IDEL tool interface.
Learners can propose improvements to the reusability and flexibility of eLearning content by analyzing formative assessment results.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
